name: MagicDust
tagline: Put the power of the internet into your hands.
description:
Magicdust is an award winning full service web design and development company. We provide quality websites, SEO strategy, e-commerce and online marketing solutions for businesses throughout Australia.
Established in 2006 by co-founders Ian Mills and Bianca Rothschild, we have delivered over 6,300 corporate websites and currently have over 4,100 happy clients. Weâ€™re 100% owned and operated in Australia.
